snippet: The boxer was sued by two people who said they paid to watch him fight Floyd Mayweather Jr. but felt defrauded by Pacquiao’s failure to disclose a shoulder injury.
abstract: Boxing fans Stephane Vanel and Kami Rahbaran file suit against fighter Manny Pacquiao saying they were defrauded because they paid to watch him fight Floyd Mayweather Jr without having been informed of shoulder injury, which was disclosed to Nevada Athletic Commission only hours before bout; are seeking class action status for suit on behalf of ticket buyers, pay-per-view television viewers and people who gambled on the fight.
lead_paragraph: The boxer was sued by two people who said they paid to watch him fight Floyd Mayweather Jr. but felt defrauded by Pacquiao’s failure to disclose a shoulder injury.

headline.main: Manny Pacquiao Defrauded Fans, Lawsuit Claims
